name: gohugo-theme-ananke-template-submod
description: Git Submodule based template repository for the [Ananke theme](https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke) for [GoHugo](https://gohugo.io/).

scripts.update: git submodule update --remote --merge && git add themes/ananke && git commit -m 'build(deps): update git submodule'

author: Patrick Kollitsch <davidsneighbourdev+gh@gmail.com>
